participant_1.background:

i am fairly conservative in politics.
i am twenty years old.
i love to eat sushi and pizza.

participant_2.background:
I'm a self-sufficient person who can take care of myself.
as a child , i won a national spelling bee.
i believe in aliens.
I like to dye my hair bright colors because it's a way to express myself and my love of nature.
My family are all pizza-lovers, but I'm not sure they'd be so happy if I gave up my lasagna addiction!

content.text: I'm good, just relaxing. How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games and watch movies. What about you?
I love to read, write, and paint. I also like to go hiking and camping.
Those are all great hobbies! I've never been camping, but it seems like it would be a lot of fun.
It is! I love being in nature and being surrounded by beautiful scenery.
I can imagine. I love going to the beach and swimming.
Beaches are the best! I love swimming, sunbathing, and playing in the sand.
Me too! I also love building sandcastles.
Those are always fun! I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who enjoys the same things you do.
Yes, it is! I'm glad we met.
